About Me

Get to know me better!

BIOGraphy

My interest in technology, information systems, software and development, which started in high school, increased even more when i started university. Learning new things and turning them into things that can be used and be lived with in my life has been one of my greatest motivating resources in life. As a young person, who has witnessed the evolution and rapid progress of technology since the early 2000s, i have realized that the future is unthinkable without technology. And this pushed me to improve myself in this field. I have been trying to produce new ideas and projects that will be beneficial to people by engaging in new and popular technologies since my university life and my graduation. I believe that serving our values is one of our biggest responsibilities.
